subSections.title: Compounds
subSections.text: {{zh-der|扁桃腺:[[tonsil]]|尿道球腺:[[bulbourethral gland]]|前庭大腺:[[Bartholin's gland]]|前庭小腺:[[Skene's gland]]|腺嘌呤:[[adenine]]|腺體:[[gland]]|乳腺|乳腺炎|內分泌腺|前列腺|唾液腺|唾腺|外分泌腺|性腺|扁桃腺炎|攝護腺|毒腺|汗腺|消化腺|淋巴腺|淚腺|無管腺|生殖腺|甲狀腺|甲狀腺素|甲狀腺腫|皮脂腺|瞼腺炎|耳下腺|耵聹腺|胃腺|胸腺|脂肪腺|腎上腺|腎上腺素|腦上腺|腦下腺|腮腺|腮腺炎|腸腺|腺病毒|腺細胞|臭腺|舌下腺|蜜腺|頷下腺|顎下腺}}

subSections.title: Glyph origin
subSections.text: {{ja-etym-kokuji}} coined in the late 1700s–early 1800s by ''[[rangaku]]'' scholar {{w|ja:宇田川玄真|Udagawa Genshin}} as a translation for {{cog|nl|klier||gland}}, as an {{Han compound|肉|alt1=⺼|泉|ls=ic|t1=flesh; body|t2=spring; fountain; source; producer of liquid|nocap=1}}, together expressing the idea “part of the body that produces liquid [[secretion]]s”.

subSections.title: Compounds
subSections.text:
{{der-top|Compounds}}
* {{ja-r|腺状|せんじょう}}: [[glandular]]
* {{ja-r|甲状腺|こうじょうせん}}: [[thyroid gland]]
* {{ja-r|管状腺|かんじょうせん}}: [[tubular gland]]
* {{ja-r|涙腺|るいせん}}: [[lacrimal gland]]
* {{ja-r|耳下腺|じかせん}}: [[parotid gland]]
* {{ja-r|顎下腺|がっかせん}}: [[submaxillary gland]]
* {{ja-r|舌下腺|ぜっかせん}}: [[sublingual gland]]
* {{ja-r|唾液腺|だえきせん}}: [[salivary gland]]
* {{ja-r|扁桃腺|へんとうせん}}: [[tonsil]]
{{der-mid}}
* {{ja-r|前立腺|ぜんりつせん}}: [[prostate gland]]
* {{ja-r|尿道球腺|にょうどうきゅうせん}}: [[bulbourethral gland]]
* {{ja-r|カウパー腺|カウパーせん}}: [[bulbourethral gland]]
* {{ja-r|スキーン腺|スキーンせん}}: [[Skene's gland]]
* {{ja-r|小前庭腺|しょうぜんていせん}}: [[Skene's gland]]
* {{ja-r|傍尿道腺|ぼうにょうどうせん}}: [[Skene's gland]]
* {{ja-r|バルトリン腺|バルトリンせん}}: [[Bartholin's gland]]
* {{ja-r|大前庭腺|だいぜんていせん}}: [[Bartholin's gland]]
* {{ja-r|汗腺|かんせん}}: [[sweat gland]]
* {{ja-r|皮脂腺|ひしせん}}: [[sebaceous gland]]
* {{ja-r|性腺|せいせん}}: [[sex gland]]
* {{ja-r|毒腺|どくせん}}: [[venom gland]]
{{der-bottom}}

subSections.title: Etymology
subSections.text:
{{wikipedia|lang=ja}} {{wikipedia|Gland}}
{{ja-kanjitab|せん|yomi=kanyoon}} See [[#Glyph origin|Glyph origin]] above. The reading ''sen'' is based on the [[漢音#Japanese|kan'on]] of the {{m|ja|泉}} base.
